name: Le Concert: FF: Fortissimo
overview: Le Concert is a Playstation game that puts the player in the role of a young classic orchestra conductor that will go through 5 different stages, begginning with a small orchestra and until a big one. The gameplay is about pressing the proper button in the proper time and if the player do it in the perfect time a number of times the stage is cleared and he can advance to the next one. Between the stages a story takes places and the character talk until the next stage begins. The game features 2 different game styles gamers mode and musicians mode, and also a listening room that will be unlocked playing the main game. In Le Concert Pianissimo the player control a female character and in Fortissimo a male one.
